de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm

Class UDPsubscriberCommLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.AbstractCommunicationLayer
      • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.UDPcommunicationLayer
        • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.forte.comm.UDPsubscriberCommLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommunicationLayer, java.io.Serializable

    public class UDPsubscriberCommLayer
extends UDPcommunicationLayer
    Bottom OSI layer for handling UDP/IP communication of a subscriber. Intended for communication with FORTE PUBLISHER function blocks.
    Author:
    Marc Jakobi

    HTW Berlin

    July 2017
    See Also:
    FORTE communication architecture, Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean closeConnection()
      Closes this layer and calls closeConnection() on the layer below.
      boolean openConnection(CommLayerParams params)
      Opens the connection and sets up the communication stack.
      byte readByte()
      Reads a byte from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.
      double readDouble()
      Reads 8 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.
      float readFloat()
      Reads 4 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.
      long readLong()
      Reads 4 bytes from the communication layer below or the connected device if this layer is the bottom layer.

      Performs the necessary actions for receiving data.

      Performs the necessary actions for sending data.
